programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Navajo Tribal Policeman Joe Leaphorn must solve a series of crimes; he partners with new deputy, Jim Chee, who is back on the reservation for the first time since he was a child; together they face down evil forces, both earthly and supernatural.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn and Chee interview the surviving witness to the Big Rock Motel murders; Chee meets with the coroner; the cause of death remains a mystery; Sgt. Manuelito makes a chilling discovery of her own.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn's niece celebrates her Kinaaldá as Leaphorn retrieves the bodies of the murder victims; Manuelito and Chee investigate the whereabouts of the missing Mormon family.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn suspects all of the crimes on the reservation are related; there is a big break in the case; Leaphorn invites Chee over for dinner; Manuelito makes a discovery of her own.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: With a major suspect in custody, Leaphorn discovers that there is more to this crime than he would have ever imagined; Manuelito faces her worst fears; Chee must make a choice between his career and his people.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn, Chee and Manuelito descend on the hiding place of the Buffalo Society, only to be confronted with hard decisions that could change the outcome of the rest of their lives.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Navajo Tribal Policeman Joe Leaphorn investigates the death of a man involved in a mysterious cult, while Jim Chee, moonlighting as a PI, works a case of his own; when their investigations collide, Leaphorn and Chee find themselves in grave danger.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn explores personal ties to an increasingly mysterious case; Chee is questioned by a reluctant Sgt. Manuelito; the discovery of a body sends Leaphorn and Manuelito in pursuit of a child in danger.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: After facing off with a dangerous man, Chee strikes out on his own; Leaphorn and Manuelito partner with the sheriff's department, leading Leaphorn to identify a vital clue.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn risks his life in pursuit of a suspect; Manuelito stands up to the sheriff in a bid to rescue her boss; seeking answers on a case, Chee considers a dangerous proposition.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: With his suspect in custody, Leaphorn races against the clock to get a confession while Chee goes under cover at the cult that ties their investigations together; Manuelito counsels a teenager who is nervous about the draft.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn and Chee discover evidence that connects their cases, only for Leaphorn to realize justice won't be easily served; Manuelito prepares for a big life change.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Lt. Joe Leaphorn and Sgt. Jim Chee investigate the disappearance of a Navajo boy; Manuelito makes a sinister discovery while adjusting to life on the border patrol; an FBI agent comes to solve a case linked to Leaphorn's recent past.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn and Chee find themselves on a manhunt after making a shocking discovery; Special Agent Washington questions Leaphorn about a person of interest; Manuelito puts her job on the line when she searches for answers at a local ranch.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: After a close call, Leaphorn and Chee follow the trail of a new suspect; the discovery of a body sends Special Agent Washington in a different direction; Manuelito puts a target on her back as she digs deeper into the mystery.

programme.title: Ducks Unlimited
programme.desc: Mentoring the next generation is a Ducks Unlimited priority and a vital part of our continuing mission. DU TV co-host Colin Mulligan is part of that next generation, coming up through our varsity and university chapter programs. This week he joins one of his mentors, author and film producer Chris Dorsey, on a thrilling early-season hunt in Saskatchewan. Their shared passion for wetlands and waterfowl conservation shines through on this bountiful Canadian adventure. All next on DU TV!

programme.title: Dating Death
programme.desc: Rodney Alcala flees Los Angeles in 1968 after the rape and attempted murder of an 8-year-old girl, but after moving to New York under an assumed name, he begins working at a New Hampshire arts camp for children.

programme.title: Dating Death
programme.desc: After his early release in 1974 from prison, Rodney Alcala's victim count continues to rise as he uses his photography skills to prey on both young women and children.

programme.title: Dating Death

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young mother is found unresponsive in bed, and her cause of death is determined to be an accidental heroin overdose; but her family questions everything about the circumstances around her death, so they launch their own investigation.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: It was a mystery that plagued law enforcement for over years: four unidentified bodies found inside barrels in the woods; one woman searching for answers from her own troubled past sets herself on a journey to give the victims back their names.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young man leaves home for the corner store, but dies on a rainy sidewalk just down the street; bystanders claim that he fell off of his bike, but his mom and sister don't buy it; they hit the streets to find answers.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: When a college student was found dead in rural Quebec, police refused to call it a murder; but years later, her brother continues his own investigation into her death; on the eve of a trip to return to the scene of the crime, tragedy strikes again.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young girl's life was thrown into chaos when her single mother died by a gunshot wound in their remote mountain home; the journey for the truth would be long and arduous, and it would be thirty years until justice was finally served.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young man whose childhood was marked by tragedy learns of a relatively unknown serial killer, and finds himself thinking about unidentified victims; it isn't long before that pursuit becomes a full-time job and identifying victims an obsession.

programme.desc: The media jumps on the defense's strategy to make Jennifer seem fast and loose; the prosecution works to establish motive.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here

programme.desc: Bode and his aunt, Sheriff Mickey Fox, investigate the attempted murder of her estranged father, Wes Fox.

programme.desc: The team finds themselves in a race against time when a terrorist group threatens to detonate a "dirty bomb" in the D.C. area.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: When a Marine is found dead, Gibbs, Fornell and the team hit the open road to bust an illegal trucking operation.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Secrets arise when Gibbs' former mother-in-law surfaces as a witness in a murder investigation.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the shooting of a Marine.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team discovers striking similarities between themselves and their CGIS (Coast Guard Investigative Services) counterparts when a Navy diver seeking sunken treasure is found dead.

programme.title: Sabrina: The Teenage Witch
programme.desc: Adhering to a fad diet from the Other Realm, Sabrina becomes so thin she literally disappears.
programme.sub-title: Now You See Her Now You Don’t

programme.title: Sabrina: The Teenage Witch
programme.desc: Childhood dreams come true when Sabrina casts a spell that turns Harvey into a superhero.

programme.title: Sabrina: The Teenage Witch
programme.desc: Valentine’s Day gets complicated when Sabrina learns two boys are vying for her heart.

programme.title: Sabrina: The Teenage Witch
programme.desc: Sabrina discovers why the road to ruin is paved with good intentions.

programme.title: Sabrina: The Teenage Witch
programme.desc: As maid of honor, Sabrina pays the price for reuniting Salem with his daughter in time for her wedding.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: Desperate to have Wilbur seen by an in-demand pediatrician, Joy creates a tangled mess of lies.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: A man Melanie intended to break up with dies, Joy dodges calls from her mother, Victoria tries an ab-toning belt, and Elka and Mamie Sue write roast jokes for a centenarian.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: Victoria contacts all her exes to find out what she could have done differently, unexpectedly seeing in-person Julian, the one who broke her heart.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: The women's group birthday includes a professor as well as a reunion of Elka and Mamie Sue's bowling team.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: At Victoria's bare-bones wedding to Emmet in prison, the officiating tabloid photographer turns out to be Simon, the man who got Joy pregnant as a teenager.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: After Alex Trebek introduces the episode, the women are held hostage by Chester, Lily, and a Mrs. Ladypants-loving plastic surgeon.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: Following Emmet's escape from prison, Victoria is under close watch by an FBI agent, and Alec's new girlfriend questions Melanie's pregnancy.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: As Joy, Owen and Simon lie about their family history to get Wilbur admitted into a prestigious preschool, Elka helps Melanie find a doctor to treat her brain tumor.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: A young Marine veteran suffers a psychotic breakdown, which causes him to believe he is back in the battle zone in Vietnam. When Danny Williams tries to assist him, Austin holds him prisoner in a hospital ward.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: The death of a young girl while under the influence of drugs leads to Five-O tracking down the supplier, who turns out to be a self-styled guru who is headmaster to a large cult of hippies.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: McGarrett and his team of police experts go into action when a man who is carrying the bubonic plague turns up in the Hawaiian Islands and the plans for a top-secret military weapon disappear.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: McGarrett plays a long shot and offers himself as the key hostage in an attempted prison break. The two convicts, each facing life imprisonment, hold seven fellow inmates as hostages, demanding that the prison gates be opened.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: With 500-year-old secrets hidden in skeletons and stone, Machu Picchu remains one of the most puzzling archaeological sites on earth; it ranks among the ancient world's most enduring riddles, pertaining to its creators and reason for its creation.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: A look at what happened to the secret hoard of the Knights Templar, a treasure of gold, silver, gems and religious relics protected by a medieval religious order.
programme.sub-title: The Lost Fortune of the Knights Templar

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: Most people know it as the biblical birthplace of man -- the Garden of Eden; investigating if the Garden of Eden was just a story to explain human creation or if it was a real place.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: Five years after John F. Kennedy is killed by gunshot, his brother Robert meets the same fate; an assassin's bullet again changes the course of history, and the latest clues in the case are riddled with inconsistencies.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: A holy relic from the Bible has been missing for over 2,000 years; while some believe the Ark of the Covenant was destroyed, many people think it's still out there; new clues could finally explain what happened.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: It's one of the most famous prehistoric monuments on Earth -- a mysterious arrangement of stones that have adorned the English countryside for millennia; nobody knows how the landmark was built or why.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: It is a legendary ancient city, said to be overflowing with gold; for centuries, explorers put their lives on the line searching for it; the quest to uncover this infamous city continues.

programme.title: South Park: Hotter Than Summer: Cat O*gy (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cat O*gy (1): Stan's sister Shelley babysits Cartman and invites her unsuitable boyfriend, Skyler, to join her. Meanwhile Cartman's cat is on heat and it's not long before he's got company! (S3, E07)

programme.title: South Park: Hotter Than Summer: Two Guys Naked in a Hot Tub (Part 2)
programme.desc: Two Guys Naked In A Hot Tub (2): Stan and his parents go to a party at Mr Mackey's but when the boys make a prank phone call to the police they surround the house and are ready to open fire. (S3, E08)
programme.sub-title: Hotter Than Summer: Two Guys Naked in a Hot Tub (Part 2)

programme.title: South Park: Chinpokomon
programme.desc: Chinpokomon: Stan, Cartman, and Kenny are caught up in the latest fad from Japan, a cartoon called Chinpokomon - but what is the secret plan behind the show's anti-American sentiments...? (S3, E11)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Big Gay Al returns to South Park as the new scout leader. When he is fired for being gay, the boys rally to his defense with the help of the new 'handi-capable' kid, Jimmy.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: After the other boys explain to Cartman that pubes don't count unless you grow your own, Cartman realizes he's been tricked by the school bully, Scott Tenorman.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When the boys discover Terrance and Philip have called it quits, they'll go to any lengths to reunite the duo and recruit them for South Park's Earth Day festivities.
programme.sub-title: Terrance and Phillip: Behind the Blow

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman inherits a million dollars from his grandmother and fulfills his lifelong dream of owning his own amusement park: Cartmanland!

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: In a time-honored tradition and right-of-passage, the boys are separated from the girls and schooled in the mysteries of sex by none other than Mr. Mackey.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When the government steals their new Gamesphere, the boys will stop at nothing to get it back.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The kids of South Park have raised money to send to the children of Afghanistan, but the Government believes the Afghani children's thank you gift is contaminated with Anthrax and the boys are forced to take it back to Afghanistan.
programme.sub-title: Osama Bin Laden Has Farty Pants

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman gets Kenny's school picture on every "missing child" milk carton in the country.
programme.sub-title: How to Eat with Your Butt

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Mr. Garrison gets fed up with long lines, delayed flights and the airline industry in general and invents his own transportation device.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Token is tired of being the only rich kid in town, and succeeds in attracting several other wealthy families to South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: In a very special episode of 'South Park,' Cartman fights for Kenny's life when he speaks before Congress in favor of stem-cell research.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Alone and lost, Butters determinedly makes his way through porn theatres and gay bathhouses in an effort to get his dad back home in time to eat at Bennigan's for his parents' anniversary.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: As the country becomes obsessed with a popular program for losing weight, the boys see an opportunity to become sponsored by a major restaurant chain.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: While the adults trapped at a time-share sales meeting, Stan is challenged by the best skier on the mountain.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When the boys learn that talk shows offer prizes to people who are grossly disfigured they can't sign Butters up fast enough.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan is appalled when he realizes the veal he's been eating is, in fact, the meat from little baby calves.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: All the kids in South Park are glued to the TV, wild with anticipation to see the first trailer for the latest Terrance and Phillip movie.
programme.sub-title: The New Terrance and Phillip Movie Trailer

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys fire Butters as their new friend. Devastation over his rejection unleashes Butters' dark side and Professor Chaos is born.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Professor Chaos is frustrated when he realizes all of his diabolical plans to wreak havoc on South Park have already been done by "The Simpsons."

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A sexual abuse scandal involving priests hits South Park and is taken all the way to the Vatican.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When the boys find out that their favorite movies are being enhanced, re-released, and ruined in the process, they form a club to 'Save Films from their Directors.'

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman gets kicked out of the gang when Bebe develops boobs and the boys lose their minds, threatening their friendships and society as we know it.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: In an effort to protect their children from kidnappers, the parents hire the owner of City Wok Restaurant to build the Great Wall of South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kenny died with the winning ticket to a prize of endless candy in his pocket. The boys decide to build a ladder to Heaven where they expect to find him and get the ticket back.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys embark upon a mythical quest as they set out to return their copy of the 'The Lord of the Rings' movie to their local video store.
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Fellowship of the Ring to the Two Towers

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys are sentenced to the Death Camp of Tolerance where they learn how to treat minorities. Mr. Slave and Lemmiwinks make their debut in this episode.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When a famous psychic fails to help him exorcise Kenny from his body, Cartman and Chef travel to the moors of Scotland, where Chef's mom tries a little of her voodoo magic on him.
programme.sub-title: The Biggest Douche in the Universe

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When a 32-year-old man claiming to be Stan from the future shows up in South Park, young Stan is forced to come to terms with the loser he will become.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman has to score one big 'nice' to be eligible for Christmas presents this year. He recruits Santa, Mr. Hankey, and Jesus in a desperate attempt to bring Christmas to the downtrodden citizens of Iraq.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Jimmy and Timmy pull together a group of people like themselves and call their new club the "Crips."

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman convinces the boys to "toilet paper" their teacher's house, but Kyle is overwhelmed with guilt.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys join some anti-war protesters because it's a free pass out of school for the day.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: One of Cartman's body parts becomes famous overnight and rivals the popularity of another superstar.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: After they return a missing doll to a little girl, the police department recognizes the boys' efforts and officially names them 'junior deputies.'

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The citizens of South Park are being forced off their land to make way for a new superhighway after owners of the Three Feathers Indian Casino acquire the town.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The town of South Park celebrates the new, hip metro-sexual craze.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kenny takes his new girlfriend to a Jonas Brothers’ concert where they each get purity rings.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman dreams of being a NASCAR driver and he’s willing to do whatever it takes to make it happen.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Coon and Friends set out to help the victims of BP’s latest catastrophic drilling accident in the Gulf. Much to the Coon’s dismay, another Super Hero gets there first.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Mysterion’s true identity is revealed. Meanwhile, the Coon, scorned by his fellow Super Heroes, is out for revenge.

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: It is time for Butters to begin a journey where he will follow in the path of his Hawaiian ancestors.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys prepare to battle the crowds already lining up for the first official day of holiday shopping.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Black Friday is almost here and the battle for the new gaming devices is heating up. Princess Kenny’s betrayal has left Cartman out for revenge.
programme.sub-title: A Song of Ass and Fire

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The doors to the mall will finally open for the biggest Black Friday sale in history. The boys are divided over which gaming device to buy and a bloody battle will determine whether Xbox or Sony will be the winner.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: There are illegal goings-on in the basement of City Wok.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The town of South Park is gentrifying and Kenny thinks it's time to get a job.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: While the boys are waiting for the school bus, Cartman explains the odd nightmare he had the previous night involving alien visitors.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Grandpa's sole birthday wish is for Stan to take part in his assisted suicide. Meanwhile, Mrs. Broflovski has organized a protest against the boys' favorite TV show, "Terrance and Phillip."

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A mishap at the morgue transforms the residents of South Park into brain-eating zombies and threatens the boys night of Trick-or-Treating.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys' discovery of a prehistoric relic spawns a monster that threatens to destroy South Park and the world.

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys travel to Costa Rica as a part of the "Getting Gay with Kids" choir tour.

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: This newsmagazine investigates intriguing crime and justice cases that touch on all aspects of the human experience. Over its long run, the show has helped exonerate wrongly convicted people, driven the reopening -- and resolution -- of cold cases, and changed numerous lives. CBS News correspondents offer an in-depth look into each story, with the emphasis on solving the mystery at its heart. The program and its team have earned critical acclaim, including multiple Emmy, Peabody and Edward R. Murrow Awards.

programme.title: CBS Weekend News
programme.desc: Journalist Adriana Diaz anchors the Saturday edition of the CBS news program from Chicago, while Jericka Duncan takes the helm of the Sunday broadcast from New York. The two are the latest to fill the roll of weekend anchor, which was most recently represented by Reena Ninan and Eliane Quijano. The program offers the latest headlines, original reporting and in-depth pieces that add context and perspective to the world's events.

programme.title: 60 Minutes
programme.desc: The oldest and most-watched newsmagazine on television gets the real story on America's most prevalent issues. CBS News correspondents contribute segments to each hourlong episode. Topics range from hard news coverage to politics, lifestyle, pop culture, business, health, and science. The correspondents and contributors include Lesley Stahl, Scott Pelley, Anderson Cooper, Bill Whitaker, Sharyn Alfonsi, Jon Wertheim and Norah O'Donnell .

programme.title: CBS News Sunday Morning
programme.desc: The sparkling notes of a trumpet fanfare and the familiar logo of the sun alert viewers that it's time for CBS's Sunday morning staple. Journalist Jane Pauley helms the show, taking over hosting duties from Charles Osgood, who spent 22 years on the job. A morning talk show, this program airs at a different pace and focuses much of its attention on the performing arts. After a quick update of the day's news and national weather, correspondents offer longer-length segments on a variety of topics, from architecture to ballet to music to pop culture to politics.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: A longtime ER nurse tries to conceal her addiction to painkillers she gets from her boyfriend, the pharmacist.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Jackie and her husband Kevin are worried that their daughter Grace might have an anxiety disorder.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Jackie meets a patient who uses his wife's chicken soup to treat his heart disease.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Jackie and Kevin think about sending their daughter Grace to a private school.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl needs Jackie's help to care for her mother who suffers from lupus.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: A gall bladder attack brings Dr. Cooper's mother to the hospital where she gives away a secret about her son.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: After the ex-husband of his date attacked him with a knife, a man is brought to the ER.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: When Jackie addresses a temp nurse's drug abuse, he calls her an hypocrite.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Jackie has to deal with the consequences of her drug abuse and Zoey's criticism of a patient's treatment.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Jackie resorts to drastic measures to keep Dr. Cooper from exposing her for falsifying an organ donor's file.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Jackie gets cut off her Percocet supply when Eddie is finally replaced by a pill-dispensing machine.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Eddie threatens to tell the truth about Jackie's family and Dr. O'Hara's mother is brought to the ER.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Jackie has cut ties with Eddie and is determined to dive back in and spend more time with her family.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Jackie helps a struggling family speed along a test to diagnose a little boy’s cystic fibrosis.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: During a playdate, Ginny Flynn and Kaitlin annoy Jackie, and Kaitlyn catches Jackie snorting a line of Adderal.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Jackie confronts Eddie about his stalking her and asks him to stay away from her family.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Jackie overreacts to Kevin’s movie date with Ginny Flynn and the girls.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Jackie sleeps with Eddie at his apartment and tells him to stop seeing Kevin.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Post-birthday party, Fiona busts her lip open, and Dr. O’Hara and Jackie stitch her up in the Peyton kitchen.

programme.title: Call Me
programme.desc: A journalist agrees to meet an obscene caller at a bar, and ends up witnessing a murder.

programme.title: Sex, Lies & Obsession
programme.desc: A high-school teacher struggles to keep her family together after she discovers her husband's sexual addiction.

programme.title: Secretary
programme.desc: A young woman, recently released from a mental hospital, gets a job as a secretary to a demanding lawyer.

programme.title: The Royals
programme.desc: After the death of their older brother, Prince Liam and Princess Eleanor have a hard time with their new roles.

programme.title: The Royals
programme.desc: Prince Liam is reunited with his ex, Gemma. The Queen and Cyrus work to counteract King Simon's wishes.

programme.title: Grace and Frankie
programme.desc: Sol takes care of Frankie after she has an earthquake freak-out, while Grace goes on her first date.

programme.title: Grace and Frankie
programme.desc: Frankie, Grace and Brianna have unexpected encounters when they try new ways to deal with being single.

programme.title: Grace and Frankie
programme.desc: Frankie takes a new look at her Yam Man Jacob, while Grace and Guy get closer. Bud and Coyote have a talk.

programme.title: Grace and Frankie
programme.desc: Brianna tries Frankie's homemade organic beauty product. Robert finds out about Guy and Grace.

programme.title: Stoked on Fishing - Exploring the Sierras: Owens River Fly Fishing
programme.desc: Wow, holy Eastern Sierra! It's been a full month of trout shows, and we've been trying to cover as much as possible with trout fishing in the creeks above Bishop. We teamed up with Jared at South and Sabrina Lake, and then we did a day hike back into God's country to Long Lake, which was incredible. Today on Stoked on Fishing, we're stopping by Mammoth's one and only Rick's Sports Center to get schooled on some fly fishing on the Owens River, just above Lake Crowley. I promise you, this is an ending to a show you won't want to miss. Ryan got a big one; Ryan got a big one!

programme.title: Stoked on Fishing - Exploring the Sierras: Lake Sabrina Trout Fishing
programme.desc: Good morning, everyone! Over the past few weeks, we've been soaking up the sun at Parer's Resort, nestled above Bishop, California, in the stunning Eastern Sierras. Our adventure kicked off with some thrilling pocket creek fishing. We then made our way to South Lake, where we spent a fantastic afternoon with Jared on the pontoon boat. Today, we're kicking off our adventure in the breathtaking surroundings of Lake Sabrina with Seth and Jared. We're venturing into the backcountry for a scenic hike to Long Lake—a first for us in this slice of paradise. Get ready for an unforgettable journey, as we're stoked on trout. Let's go fishing.

programme.title: Angling Buzz - Summer Midwest Fishing
programme.desc: It's late June and right now it's primetime for hot river fishing across the Upper Midwest for a variety of different reasons. programme.desc: It's late June and right now it's primetime for hot river fishing across the Upper Midwest for a variety of different reasons. Number one would be the low stable flows of the rivers, most of the rivers are also running fairly clear. Number two is it puts fish in fairly identifiable areas in the river thanks to the current. Today's guests is Captain Ben Wolfe of Sport Fish Michigan who targets a wide variety of fish throughout the river systems of Michigan.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: A beautiful beach day and confident anglers is the perfect scenario to prove tarpon never play by the rules. Justin & Meredith get a dose of tarpon psychology and begin to second guess their angling skills.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Justin and Meredith return to the chase after taking a lesson from finicky tarpon. This time, they pay close attention to how hooks and presentations affect their odds of a strike.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Capt. Todd Jones jumps on Justin’s boat for a sight fishing dream day. After success along the beach, they turn to handlining for Goliath grouper and witness the amazing survival saga of the world’s luckiest fish.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Justin entices a friend to play hooky from work to set hooks offshore on a perfect “locals” day. The only thing better than the weather was the dinner they caught and cooked.

programme.title: FinQuest
programme.desc: In Episode 4 of FinQuest, Ryan Miller explores Jupiter’s Inner Coastal Waterway, blending fishing, paddleboarding, and community engagement. With the help of Matthew from Jupiter Live Bait, Ryan showcases bait preparation techniques before catching snook in the vibrant ICW. He highlights Jupiter's community spirit by joining a local clean-up initiative with Jeremy from Blue Line Paddleboards. The episode features paddleboarding adventures with Ryan’s family, connecting with nature and marine life, and ends with a conservation message about preserving Jupiter’s pristine environment.

programme.title: FinQuest
programme.desc: In Episode 5 of FinQuest, Ryan Miller dives into the vibrant world of offshore fishing off the coast of Palm Beach County. Joined by Cabo Mike, they showcase expert bait techniques and strategies, reeling in a variety of catches, including bonita and a stunning mahi mahi. The duo shares insights into their fishing setup, explains the use of daisy chains, and celebrates their exciting day at sea. With breathtaking views of the ocean and a colorful array of fish, Ryan’s passion for saltwater fishing shines through. The episode wraps up with a reflection on the beauty and bounty of Palm Beach County waters.

programme.title: Into The Blue

programme.title: Reel Animals

programme.title: Reel Animals

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton and Rex link up with Gehrig Dieter and Anthony Sherman from the Kansas City Chiefs. While filling the boat with crappie they got to learn about the guys and their careers in the NFL.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: The Southards are heads to Table Rock for the annual family vacation. Receding water poses a challenge but there’s no lack of fish or laughs at the lake!

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Over a decade after the game changing Longbeard XR was introduced by Winchester, the wait is finally over for their next ground breaking turkey load. After years of perfecting the recipe behind the scenes, Winchester finally unveiled the new Longbeard TSS at a turkey camp in northern Michigan. First watch the jaw dropping Longbeard TSS pattern board testing, then see it go to work on some spring gobblers.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Nestled in the hills of Ohio just west of the Appalachians is a very special deer camp ripe with memories from deer season’s past. With the development of the 350 Legend straight-walled cartridge by Winchester in 2019, a world of opportunities now existed in states like Ohio and Michigan. In this episode, with the 350 Legend in hand, three mature whitetails meet their maker, from the same blind, over the course of three seasons.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: It’s been 60 years since AA was introduced to the shooting sports world. Since that day, an immeasurable number of AA hulls have hit the ground and countless shooters have stood center stage raising a trophy where millions of dollars have been won. Professional and recreational shooters alike have trusted AA for six decades. In this episode, load up for stories of high school, collegiate competitors and the world’s best as they bust clays with the legendary shot shell. - GUESTS: Zach Keenbaum (Team Winchester) Desi Edmunds (Team Winchester) Kayla Wilgus (Team Winchester) Amy Cawley (Team Winchester) Anthony Matarese (Team Winchester).

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: For the first time in history, the World English Sporting Clays Championship was held in the United States at the incredible M&M Hunting Preserve owned by the Matarese family in New Jersey. Watch as Winchester’s best shooters vie for Gold as they compete against over 2,500 shooters and 17 countries. We’ll also join the Kids and Clays foundation in Florida as they host an event that will most certainly touch your soul.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "Louisiana's Wild Food & Award-Winning Cuisine - Hog Hunting, Swamp Fishing & MORE"
programme.desc: In Episode 2: New Orleans, Josh links up with Mason Hereford (owner of award-winning sandwich shop Turkey and the Wolf) and then hits the road for some epic hog hunting, swamp fishing, crawfish and oyster harvesting, and exploring Louisiana’s only water buffalo dairy farm. It all culminates in one incredible feast featuring unique regional dishes prepared by Mason with the help of some local friends.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "Can You Surf & Eat Like a Local in Minnesota? Wild Foraging & Delicious Local Eats"
programme.desc: In Episode 3, Josh starts off in the Twin Cities where he meets up with Yia Vang, an award-winning Hmong chef and restaurant owner, bringing his family’s traditions and flavors to the American Midwest. As Josh heads up north to Duluth and the boundary waters, he’ll meet plenty of farmers and foragers—harvesting mushrooms, wild rice, and catching a few fish (and waves) along the way. It all wraps up with an epic feast hosted by Yia back in the cities.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "Exploring New York City's Hidden Culinary Gems: Cooking Goat Brains, Lobster & MORE"
programme.desc: New. York. City. That’s where our host Josh Rosen kicks off his journey in Episode 4—and where he lived for 16 years and started up the surf-centric apparel brand, Saturdays NYC. Back in his old stomping grounds, Josh first meets up with the award-winning chef and Mumbai native, Chintan Pandya, currently blowing up the New York food scene with his unapologetic and authentic Indian cuisine (pro tip: try the goat brains). Next, Josh travels through the boroughs, heads upstate, and along the coast to source local ingredients—from sake brewers and pig farmers to catching fresh lobster just 100 miles from Wall Street. As always the adventure will end with a feast, right back in Chintan’s kitchen.

programme.title: Dirt

It’s about protecting the tradition, so they always have something to look forward to. When communities come together, we see the real reason for this special time of year.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.sub-title: "Freak Show - Largest Buck I’ve Ever Encountered"
programme.desc: The hunt for FREAK SHOW became a thrilling adventure after I spotted him on Cabela’s trail cam. Having hunted Kentucky for over a decade and established my own properties—Bootleggers Ridge and Stonewall Plantation—I was eager for the chance at such a remarkable deer. Despite having drawn a coveted caribou tag through Worldwide Trophy Adventures’ TAGS Program, the allure of FREAK SHOW was too strong to resist. After careful planning and waiting for the right wind, I finally - set out on September 11. With my crossbow in hand, I waited anxiously in the stand, my heart racing as the shadows lengthened. Just when I thought the evening might end without a sighting, a movement caught my eye, sending my pulse soaring. With caution, FREAK SHOW appeared.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.sub-title: "Opening Week in Mississippi started off with a BANG!!"
programme.desc: Opening day in Mississippi has arrived and Slade is taking full advantage of it! With the weather not cooperating Slade and Zeb stumble into a turkey hunt they won't soon forget. Two days later, the hot streak continues with Slade connecting on another turkey on an 83 acre property he has for sale! Also, Slade gives some tips and his ideas on small acreage hunting, and how it can be just as lucrative as big tracks of land!

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: For decades, Paul Butski has set the standard in turkey calling. His name is etched into the NWTF Grand National Calling Championships Hall of Fame, and his influence stretches far beyond the stage. He didn’t just win competitions, he shaped the way we talk to turkeys – and more importantly, the way we hunt them.

programme.title: HuntStand Presents

programme.desc: In Episode 3, Josh starts off in the Twin Cities where he meets up with Yia Vang, an award-winning Hmong chef and restaurant owner, bringing his family’s traditions and flavors to the American Midwest. As Josh heads up north to Duluth and the boundary waters, he’ll meet plenty of farmers and foragers—harvesting mushrooms, wild rice, and catching a few fish (and waves) along the way. It all wraps up with an epic feast hosted by Yia back in the cities.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "Exploring New York City's Hidden Culinary Gems: Cooking Goat Brains, Lobster & MORE"
programme.desc: New. York. City. That’s where our host Josh Rosen kicks off his journey in Episode 4—and where he lived for 16 years and started up the surf-centric apparel brand, Saturdays NYC. Back in his old stomping grounds, Josh first meets up with the award-winning chef and Mumbai native, Chintan Pandya, currently blowing up the New York food scene with his unapologetic and authentic Indian cuisine (pro tip: try the goat brains). Next, Josh travels through the boroughs, heads upstate, and along the coast to source local ingredients—from sake brewers and pig farmers to catching fresh lobster just 100 miles from Wall Street. As always the adventure will end with a feast, right back in Chintan’s kitchen.

programme.title: TRP
programme.desc: The King of Cedar Key, Capt. Jimbo Keith ⎮ Episode #867 - On Today’s Podcast, I have a very special guest, He is known as the King of Cedar Key, Captain Jimbo Keith. Nearly 40 years ago, Jimbo’s father, Jimbo Sr, founded Saltwater Assassin, the premiere charter fishing company in Cedar Key. Working at the same company, Jimbo heads an airboat through the shallow waters of Northern Florida. Join us in learning about the beautiful Old Florida, and what it is like captaining 270 days out of the year. - Jimbo’s Links: - Saltwater Assassin - https://fishcedarkey.com - Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/FishCedarKey/ - Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/captjimbokeith/ - YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCA54Q_2S0kUZyv2EtlducmA - My Links: - https://linktr.ee/TomRowlandPodcast - Link to Book Club on: - Tomrowlandpodcast.com.

programme.title: Winchester Life

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Every spring brings a new opportunity to take a step forward & recall the memories of seasons past. World War II Veteran and retired Judge Arden Hill has spent most of his life chasing turkeys in the hills of Tennessee. Now in his 90’s, Arden doesn’t let age stand in the way of his love for spring turkey hunting. Also: patterning turkey shotguns and hunting spring gobblers.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Winchester introduces the Shoot United brand aimed at offering useful information and tips to the millions of new shooters entering the shooting sports. New York native and Midland University competitive shotgun shooter Amy Cawley and her journey as a student-athlete is followed. Also: Theo Ribbs gives shooting tips for competition and Foster Bartholow reviews Winchester AA Diamond Grade.
